thread.section_title: Think Protection Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Think Protection | thinkprotection.com
thread.title: EGordo

author: EGordo
title: EGordo
text: Been with Think over a year now. I love how they were able to take over my old wired system and still allow me to use the app to control my alarm. I'm paying less for a smart system on cellular (no need for wifi or landline) than i was for my antiquated system. And it gives me the flexibility to add other smart products like lights and cameras. Think is a great option if you're looking for a reliable company on the cusp of technology for a fraction of the cost of the big boys.
